name: pdu
description: Represents a BACnet protocol data unit (PDU), specifying the type of PDU used in BACnet communication.

options.name: confirmed-request-pdu
options.description: A confirmed request PDU that expects an acknowledgment.

options.name: unconfirmed-request-pdu
options.description: An unconfirmed request PDU that does not expect an acknowledgment.

options.name: simple-ack-pdu
options.description: A simple acknowledgment PDU for a confirmed request.

options.name: complex-ack-pdu
options.description: A complex acknowledgment PDU that can include response data.

options.name: segment-ack-pdu
options.description: A segment acknowledgment PDU used with segmented messages.

options.name: error-pdu
options.description: An error PDU indicating a service error response.

options.name: reject-pdu
options.description: A reject PDU indicating a request was rejected.

options.name: abort-pdu
options.description: An abort PDU indicating a transaction was aborted.
